Parameters: int: the resource identifier of the ColorStateList to retrieve
getColorStateList(android.content.Contex.Description: Returns the @B_android#content#res#ColorStateList_E@ from the given resource. The resource can include themeable attributes, regardless of API level.

Returns: Drawable An object that can be used to draw this resource.
Parameters: int: The desired resource identifier, as generated by the aapt tool. This integer encodes the package, type, and resource entry. The value 0 is an invalid identifier.
getDrawable(android.content.Context, int.Description: Return a drawable object associated with a particular resource ID. This method supports inflation of <vector> and <animated-vector> resources on devices where platform support is not available.

ClassDesc: Class for accessing an application's resources through AppCompat, and thus any backward compatible functionality.
